channel.title: People cant join my server
channel.description:
Why can't anybody join my server?
when they go to moparscape or any other client, and put in their username, password, and server it says Error connecting to server.
i dont understand i have no-ip running, im logged in my server and ive port forwarded.
how do i fix this problem?

item.title: People cant join my server
item.dc:creator: @PatScape PatScape
item.description:
@PatScape wrote:

Have someone trying to connect do this:

go to Start menu, Run. Type in ‘cmd’ (minus the ‘’). then in the cmd prompt type ping serverip
serverip being blahblah.no-ip.com
Ask them if they get a timed out response or whether it says it recieved packets back. If it recieved packets back, then your problem is in your server. If not, you didnt pf correctly

Read full topic
